infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow PokeExplorer to access your camera to catch Pokemon.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow PokeExplorer to save Pokemon to your gallery.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow PokeExplorer to find Pokemon near you.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow PokeExplorer to access your photos.
plugins.saveToPhotosPermission: Allow PokeExplorer to save Pokemon to your gallery.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow PokeExplorer to access your camera.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow PokeExplorer to use your location.
